page.title: 01NORTHOLT AND ITS ENVIRONS
page.content: Our D block is networked with main roads, the busiest being the{Western {Avenue.}Commuters to Central London are well served by this and by efficient rail and tube lines. Most jobs in our area are industrial, but many work at{Heathrow Airport}which, though not in our D block is easily accessible.The landscape comprises a mixture of residential and industrial buildings,interspersed with open areas of grassland.A prominent feature is the{Grand Union Canal}which winds through our D block.We also have several sights of historical importance,including{St Mary's Church. {We have a multi-faith}community with a mixture of Christian and non-Christian religions. Although not perfect for everyone's needs, our D block is a friendly and enjoyable place in which to live and work in{1985. }
